name: Chansey

attacks.name: Scrunch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Chansey during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

flavorText: A rare and elusive Pok√©mon that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to catch it.

strengths: 120 HP is tied for highest in Base Set era
Basic Pokemon requires no evolution setup
weaknesses: Fighting weakness is devastating against Hitmonchan
No efficient attack - Double-edge costs 4 energy
synergies: Alakazam - Damage Swap moves damage off Chansey
Pokemon Center - Heal all damage if no energy attached
Scoop Up - Return damaged Chansey to hand
Double Colorless Energy - Power up attacks faster
counters: Hitmonchan - Fighting weakness one-shots with Special Punch
Machamp - Fighting type with high damage
Energy Removal - Prevent Chansey from attacking

competitiveHistory: Chansey was a staple in Damage Swap decks alongside Alakazam. Its massive 120 HP made it the perfect damage sponge - opponents would struggle to knock it out while Alakazam redistributed damage. Chansey also saw play in stall decks using Scrunch and Pokemon Center to outlast opponents.

rulings.ruling: If Scrunch's coin flip is heads, all damage from attacks is prevented, but other effects (like status conditions) still apply.
Double-edge's self-damage is applied even if the attack does no damage to the Defending Pokemon (such as when blocked by a Trainer card).
The self-damage from Double-edge can Knock Out Chansey if it reduces Chansey to 0 HP.
Defender reduces the self-damage from Double-edge by 20.
